thethorton:AdministrativeActions.NAME: Administrative Actions
thethorton:AdministrativeActions.DESCRIPTION: Choose any Thorton card and put it on top of your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
thethorton:AdministrativeActions.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose any card and put it on top of your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

thethorton:AngerMoment.NAME: Anger Moment
thethorton:AngerMoment.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy doesn't intend to attack, apply !M! Vulnerable.

thethorton:BattleTrash.NAME: Battle Trash
thethorton:BattleTrash.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL You cannot draw additional cards this turn.

thethorton:BusinessBash.NAME: Business Bash
thethorton:BusinessBash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a thethorton:Business_Card into your hand. NL Exhaust.
thethorton:BusinessBash.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a upgraded thethorton:Business_Card into your hand. NL Exhaust.

thethorton:BusinessCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play 10 thethorton:Business_Cards, obtain a Relic. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

thethorton:CallShop.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain 30 Gold. NL The next ? room you enter contains a shop. NL Exhaust.

thethorton:CashBash.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Gold. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust.

thethorton:ChartProject.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to attack, gain !B! Block. NL Otherwise, gain [E] and draw 1 card next turn.
thethorton:ChartProject.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL If the enemy intends to attack, gain !B! Block. NL Otherwise, gain [E] and draw 1 card next turn.

thethorton:GemGun.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL If at least 3 Gems match, gain 50 Gold. NL Exhaust.

thethorton:CrashingStocks.NAME: Crashing Stocks
thethorton:CrashingStocks.DESCRIPTION: If you have at least 100 Gold, lose 100 Gold and deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

thethorton:CreditCard.NAME: Credit Card
thethorton:CreditCard.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Gold. NL Can be Upgraded any number of times. NL Exhaust.

thethorton:Demotion.NAME: Demotion
thethorton:Demotion.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies cannot buff themselves or debuff you. NL Exhaust.

thethorton:Distance.NAME: Distance
thethorton:Distance.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply 1 Weak to ALL enemies.

thethorton:DodgeAndRollAndRun.NAME: Dodge & Roll & Run
thethorton:DodgeAndRollAndRun.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, gain !B! Block. NL thethorton:Run.

thethorton:DownPayment.NAME: Down Payment
thethorton:DownPayment.DESCRIPTION: The top card of your draw pile costs 0 until played.

thethorton:ElbowSmash.NAME: Elbow Nudge
thethorton:ElbowSmash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw 1 additional card next turn.

thethorton:EquivalentExchange.NAME: Fair Trade
thethorton:EquivalentExchange.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust 1 card. NL Put a card from your exhaust pile into your hand. NL Exhaust.

thethorton:SheetShred.NAME: Sheet Shred
thethorton:SheetShred.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL At the start of each of your turns, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies. NL Shuffle this card into your draw pile.

thethorton:Escape.NAME: Escape!
thethorton:Escape.DESCRIPTION: 33% chance to escape a non-boss combat. NL Receive no rewards. NL thethorton:Run. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.
thethorton:Escape.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 33% chance to escape a non-boss combat. NL thethorton:Run. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

thethorton:Fatigue.NAME: Fatigue
thethorton:Fatigue.DESCRIPTION: Apply Weak equal to your held Gold. NL Exhaust.

thethorton:Fish.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Cost cannot be modified. NL Obtain a Relic. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I haven't Gathered enough Pyro Buddies!

thethorton:LastDitchEffort.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If your HP is below 50%, deal !D! damage. NL If your HP is below 25%, deal !D! damage.

thethorton:LongDaysWork.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust 1 card.

thethorton:ROI.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !M! Gold. NL Exhaust.

thethorton:ScalingIsWin.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain 1 Strength.
thethorton:ScalingIsWin.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain 1 Strength and draw 1 additional card.

thethorton:StumblingSlap.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If you have Weak, gain !B! Block.

thethorton:TemporalBlast.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Play a copy of the next card you play this turn at the start of the next combat. NL Exhaust.

thethorton:ThickSkin.NAME: Thick Skin
thethorton:ThickSkin.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you lose non-Temporary HP, gain 2 Temporary_HP.

thethorton:WhirlingBriefcase.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Gold for each enemy. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

thethorton:SummonProfit.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add 1 random card from any color into your hand. NL Draw 1 card. NL They cost 0 until played. NL Exhaust.

thethorton:CoffeeBlast.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Add 2 random cards from any color into your hand. NL They have Retain. NL Exhaust.

thethorton:DeepFear.NAME: Deep Fear
thethorton:DeepFear.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you receive unblocked attack damage, thethorton:Run.

thethorton:Jackpot.NAME: Loan
thethorton:Jackpot.DESCRIPTION: Upon pickup, gain 300 Gold. NL Exhaust.

thethorton:GoldenPetal.NAME: Golden Petal

thethorton:GoldenPetal.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Card rewards from this combat are Rare cards from any class. NL Exhaust.

thethorton:SuperStrike.NAME: Strike?
thethorton:SuperStrike.DESCRIPTION: Bash the target enemy with your briefcase, inflicting !D! physical damage. This damage is affected by Strength, Weak, Flying, Vulnerable, and other damage modifiers. This card moves to the discard pile when played.

thethorton:SuperDefend.NAME: Defend?
thethorton:SuperDefend.DESCRIPTION: Shield yourself from enemy attacks with your briefcase, completely preventing the next !B! physical damage taken this turn. The amount of damage prevented is increased by the user's Dexterity. This card moves to the discard pile when played.

thethorton:MidnightStrike.NAME: Midnight Strike
thethorton:MidnightStrike.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if you have played exactly 11 cards this combat. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust.

thethorton:OhNo.NAME: Oh No
thethorton:OhNo.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain 1 Intangible. NL Exhaust.
